item.title: How do i make a starter command?
item.dc:creator: @ytpingas ytpingas
item.description:
@ytpingas wrote:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 50000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
sM(“Thanks for using the Starter command!”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry. You already got your starter package…”);

        }[/code]

try that

item.title: How do i make a starter command?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:5, topic:322811”][quote author=imsokool22 link=topic=419192.msg3080183#msg3080183 date=1262107644]
ok to make it use a command generator find 1 there is 1 in a tool pack then make the command in ther and copy and paste the code in client.java need more help finding a starter pack nd pasting it in client.java?Pm me.

EDIT: HERE is the code for starter once

[quote] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 50000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
sendMessage(“Svew Scape Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry. You already got your starter package…”);

        }
    }

[/quote] ^there
[/quote]
the savechar and the savemoreinfo codes gave me a bunch of errors.
can someone give me a working 317 starter COMMAND please :D[/quote]

that does work.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a starter command?
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

ok to make it use a command generator find 1 there is 1 in a tool pack then make the command in ther and copy and paste the code in client.java need more help finding a starter pack nd pasting it in client.java?Pm me.

EDIT: HERE is the code for starter once

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 50000000); addItem(392, 15000); addItem(554, 20000); addItem(555, 20000); addItem(565, 20000); addItem(556, 20000); addItem(557, 20000); addItem(560, 20000); addItem(561, 20000); addItem(562, 20000); addItem(563, 20000); addItem(566, 20000); addItem(558, 20000); sendMessage("Svew Scape Starter Package"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Sorry. You already got your starter package.."); 
        }
    }</blockquote> ^there
